subject: Attn:Dear Customer,
body:
Attn:Dear Customer,
I have been planning on how to get things being in order to you and to get
everything completed. This is to let you know that I have
finalized with the bank manager,to credit your ( $1.800,000.00USD
) to an ATM VISA CARD.So your inherited funds of ( $1.800,000.00USD
)has been converted and credited to an ATM VISA CARD. This is to bring
to your notice that I have paid the re-activation fee and the delivery
of your ATM VISA CARD.
I paid it because the ATM Card worth of $1.800,000.00USD will expire
soon and when it expires, the whole money will go into Federal
Government treasury account in my country here,so because of that I
decided to help you pay off the money so that the ATM Card fund will
not expire, and Iâ€™m convinced that when you receive your ATM VISA Card
that you must pay me back all my money and even compensate me for
helping you.
Now I want you to contact the ATM card office with your home /office
address that you prefer for the delivery to be made so that they can
deliver your ATM Visa Card to your designated address in your country
without any delay. Like I stated earlier,The delivery charges has been
paid but I did not pay their official keeping fees because they
refused. They refused,the reason is that they do not know when you are
going to contact them and the demurrage might have increased. They
told me that their keeping fees is $25 per day,while I deposited it
this week Monday.
Below is the Contact Information of the ATM office, Contact Person:
Mr.Robertson Lucas, Office Email: (
rlucas657777@gmail.com
)
Contact him today to avoid increase of their keeping fees and let me
know once you receive your ATM Visa card.
Thanks and remain bless
Best Regards.
Mr.Johnson Higgis

subject: Re:   Attn:Dear Customer,
body:
Hello Higgis,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in getting things in order for me. It's great to hear that my inherited funds have been converted and credited to an ATM VISA card. 

I understand the importance of not letting the card expire, so it's good that you have already paid the fee and arranged for the delivery of the card. However, I'm a bit confused about the keeping fees that you mentioned. Could you please explain what those fees are for?

Also, could you provide me with more details about the ATM card office? How long will it take for them to deliver the card once I provide them with my address? And is there any specific information or documents they need from me?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: REMINDER
body:
Attention:Micheal,

Having read your email and the questions thereof.

I will answer the questions serially.

The atm card had been deposited in the bank strong or security room which
the bank the manager confirmed that it would attract a daily charge of
$25.The fee is on till you have contacted for the sending of the card to
your address.

I tried to pay for the daily charge on the day but the manager said no till
you have contacted for the delivery.As at today,the atm card has lasted for
12 days which is $300.

Since you have contacted and wanted to claim your atm card,I called to the
manager who told me the accumulated charges and said that the daily charge
would been suspended since you have reverted back.

He said that the would be no further request of any documents from
whatsoever,that as soon as you receive the card you will take to any atm
center of your choice and begin to withdraw from it.

The duration to get the atm card to your doorstep is 72 Hours via courier
company.The tracking number will be sent to you to enable you monitor its
movement till it gets to you.

You have to contact the bank and send your contact address to them now.I am
waiting to confirm from you as soon as you have received the tracking
number of your Atm card.
Yours
Johnson Higginson

subject: Re: REMINDER
body:
Hello Johnson Higginson,

Thank you for your response and providing me with the information. I appreciate your help in clarifying the process.

I understand that the ATM card has been deposited in the bank's strong or security room, and there is a daily charge fee until I contact for the sending of the card to my address. Could you please let me know what the daily charge fee is?

Also, you mentioned that you tried to pay for the daily charge on the day but the manager said no until I have contacted for the ATM card. How can I go about contacting for the card?

I'm glad to hear that once I receive the card, there will be no further request for any documents. That makes things easier.

Could you please provide me with more details about how to contact the bank and send my contact address? Is there a specific department or person I should reach out to?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to receiving the tracking number of my ATM card.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Attention:Micheal,
body:
Attention:Micheal,

Once again thanks for your timely response.

The daily charges,I had explained for you twice,may be you do not
understand it.The daily charge is $25 and the ATM Card has stayed 12 days
which is $300.

Based on your request,I wondered for the request of the contact person,I
had provided it in my first email.The contact person is Robertson Kuca and
his direct email is
crystydawg@hotmail.com

You can contact him with your address and phone number where the ATM Card
will be delivered to and more importantly the demmurrage charges of $300.

Thank you and remain blessed.
Johnson Higgis

subject: Re: REMINDER
body:
Hello Johnson Higginson,

Thank you for your response and providing me with the information. I appreciate your help in clarifying the process.

I understand that the ATM card has been deposited in the bank's strong or security room, and there is a daily charge fee until I contact for the sending of the card to my address. Could you please let me know what the daily charge fee is?

Also, you mentioned that you tried to pay for the daily charge on the day but the manager said no until I have contacted for the ATM card. How can I go about contacting for the card?

I'm glad to hear that once I receive the card, there will be no further request for any documents. That makes things easier. Can you confirm if there are any other fees or charges associated with using this ATM card?

Lastly, could you please provide me with more details about how to contact the bank and send my contact address? I want to make sure everything is done correctly.

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

Attention: ,

The contractual agreement between the British
Government and the International Monetary Funds IMF,the Government directed
the IMF based on the mutual agreement to pay a compensation to the Foreign
creditors and the locals who were scam victims.

The sum of $15M was approved on your name as a compensation and the IMF is
under Oath to facilitate the payment under the time frame of 72 Hours.

In furtherance to the agreement, you are directed to state all the money
you had lost to the scammers,the lost money must be added up to the total
fund approved on your name.You are not going to lose any money both now and
then as no money would be lost.The slogan is simple,you must receive your
money as it is clearly stated in the mutual agreement signed between the
Government and the IMF.

The payment will take place as soon as you reply
with your information as it is stated below ;-

Your Names
Your Address
Your Phone
Your Personal ID.

Thanks and remain blessed,I await your reply.

Yours,
Johnson Higginson

subject: Re: Reminder
body:
Hello Johnson Higginson,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the information you have provided. I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly. Could you please explain to me again what the daily charge is for and how many days the ATM Card has been staying? Also, who is Robertson Lucas and why should I contact him with my address and phone number?

I'm sorry if I have any confusion, but I want to make sure I have all the details before proceeding. Thank you for your patience.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Michael,
body:
Michael,

Truly,you understood my explanation but you only wanted to ask questions
without ending.

The ATM Card daily demurrage is $25.It has stayed 12 days,which was $300 as
at Friday.

Mr.Roberston Lucas is the Operation Manager,in charge of the ATM Card.

You are contacting him because you are the owner of the card and he can not
deliver the card without your response to him.
Johnson Higgis

subject: Re: Michael,
body:
Hello Johnson Higgis,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the ATM Card and the daily demurrage. Could you please explain what exactly demurrage means in this context? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Also, could you tell me more about Lucas and his role as the Operation charge of the ATM Card? What does he do exactly?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: REMINDER
body:
Hello Johnson Higginson,

Thank you for your response and providing me with the information. I appreciate your help in clarifying the process.

I understand that the ATM card has been deposited in the bank's strong or security room, and there is a daily charge fee until I contact for the sending of the card to my address. Could you please let me know what the daily charge fee is?

Also, you mentioned that you tried to pay for the daily charge on the day but the manager said no until I have contacted for the ATM card. How long has this process been going on? I just want to make sure I have all the necessary details.

I'm glad to hear that once I receive the card, there will be no further request for any documents. That definitely makes things easier. Could you please confirm if there are any other fees or charges associated with this process?

Lastly, you mentioned that it will take hours via courier to get the ATM card to my doorstep. That sounds quite efficient! Will I receive a tracking number so that I can monitor its movement?

Once again, thank you for your assistance. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: REMINDER
body:
Hello Johnson Higginson,

Thank you for your response and providing me with the information. I appreciate your help in clarifying the process.

I understand that the ATM card has been deposited in the bank's strong or security room, and there is a daily charge fee until I contact for the card to be sent to my address. Could you please let me know what the daily charge fee is?

Also, you mentioned that you tried to pay for the daily charge but were told by the manager that it cannot be done until I have contacted for the ATM card. How many days has it been since this process started?

I'm glad to hear that once I receive the card, there will be no further requests for documents. That makes things easier. Can you confirm if there are any other fees or charges associated with using this ATM card?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to receiving the tracking number of my ATM card.

Michael

body:
